title: FFL (Fat Fucking Lie)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Ready aim fire!
No ones fuckin' 'round standin' in the line!
You gotta feel it right between the eyes!
Time is runnin' out, time to do it right now!
[Chorus]
My oh my
Everything's gonna be fine
My oh my
Fat fucking lie!
[Verse 2]
Let yourself go, let me test your fate!
Make your hair grow, make your legs shake!
Dance to the sound of heartache!
[Chorus]
My oh my
Everything's gonna be fine
My oh my
Fat fucking lie! Oh
[Bridge]
Fat fucking lie!
Get on your bikes and ride!

[Chorus]
My oh my
Everything's gonna be fine
My oh my
Fat fucking lie!
Fat fucking lie!
